column5: Morning, Just got the new Cabela's spring catalog and getting a little spring fever, wondering what sonar/mapping units that anybody has an opinion on and what map to get for the Sabaskong Bay and immediate areas to the west of there..I'd like to get out a little further and would be more comfortable with an accurate map with navigational hazards marked..Thanks
I've found the Bluchart Map by Garmin to be very good in those waters. I use a hand held Garmin 60C in combonation with my older Lowrance X85. Not integrated together, but does the job. "Slayer"
Ed, What do you hear from Dave and Sheree? Did you get to Duck Bay last fall to see them? Marv
Ed, What do you hear from Dave and Sheree? Did you get to Duck Bay last fall to see them? Marv

Hey nice to hear from you. I did get to Duck Bay late last summer. Dave and Sheree mentioned you had been around. I'm looking forward to getting back there last week of May for the spring fishing. "Slayer"
